law.text:
As used in KRS 190.270 to 190.320:
"Odometer" means an instrument for measuring and recording the actual distance a motor vehicle or motor home as defined in KRS 190A.010 travels while in operation; but shall not include any auxiliary odometer designed to be reset by the operator of the motor vehicle for the purpose of recording mileage on trips;
"Repair and replacement" means to restore to a sound working condition by replacing the odometer or any part thereof or by correcting what is inoperative; and
"Transfer" means to change ownership by purchase, gift, or any other means.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 27, sec. 22, effective January 1, 2015. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 246, sec. 1., effective June 19, 1976.
